name: Last City: Destroy Zombie
description:
Last City: Destroy Zombie will give you this chance to survival with courage and determination. Dare and face the zombie survival escape Don't be a hopeless survivor you have to plan all of your moves very carefully because there is much danger around. Fight with zombies dangerous. Keep your weapon along with you to don't make it last shelter. You have to escape from the lost island survival to complete all the survival mission to prove yourself as a real survivor hero.
Features:
- Multiple challenges to complete
- Unpredictable Environment
- Amazing experience
- kill down zombies
- lost survival story
- learn about surviving skills
- Heroic zombie survival battle mission
